full_summary:
# Rotary Chairs (Request for Proposal)

**Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP)**

## Overview

Environment and Climate Change Canada requests proposals for the purchase, delivery, and installation of rotary chairs for its office in Gatineau, Quebec.

## Formal Requirements

*   Product Category: Office Furniture
*   Product Sub-category: Rotary Chairs
*   Product Description: Multi-task rotary chairs, excluding specialized models
*   Quantity: Not specified
*   Location: Gatineau, Quebec
*   Installation Locations: Gatineau, Quebec
*   Delivery Period: Before March 31st, 2023
*   Contractor Requirements: Proposals must be submitted by pre-qualified suppliers with a valid supply arrangement

## Trade Agreements

The proposed procurement is subject to the following trade agreements:

*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Columbia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement

## Procurement Status

This tender is no longer active. The procurement status was closed on October 3rd, 2022, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Time). Any new procurements will be announced separately.

## Contractor Contact Information

*   Name: Moufid Samri
*   Email: Moufid.Samri@ec.gc.ca
*   Phone: 514-496-2617
*   Address: 105 McGill - 5th floor, Montreal, QC H2Y 2E7
